# preferredDatePickerStyle

**Instance Property**

The preferred style of the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredDatePickerStyle: UIDatePickerStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the display style that you prefer. If the style changes, the date picker may generate a layout pass to update the display.

The default style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle/automatic]. For a list of styles, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle].

## Configuring the date picker style

- **datePickerStyle**: The current style of the date picker.
- **UIDatePickerStyle**: Styles that determine the appearance of a date picker.
